caption.center: STATE OF MISSOURI, RESPONDENT, v. ALFRED CHARLES HARDY KING, JR.,

court.center: Missouri Court of Appeals, Eastern District,

date.center: Motion for Rehearing and/or Transfer Denied May 13, 1986.

opinion.posture: APPEAL FROM CIRCUIT COURT, MARION COUNTY; RONALD McKENZIE, JUDGE.
opinion.attorneys:
Kathleen Murphy Markie, Public Defender, Columbia, for appellant.
John Munson Morris, Asst. Atty. Gen., Jefferson City, for respondent.
opinion.opinion_text:
[1] Direct appeal from a jury conviction for stealing property valued at $150.00 or more, in violation of ยง 570.030, RSMo Supp. 1984.
[2] Judgment affirmed. Rule 30.25(b).
